channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WordPress Comments Fields
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WordPress Comments Fields

item.title: CVE-2022-2398|2024-08-03T00:39:06.414Z -- unknown -- wordpress%20comments%20fields
item.description: The WordPress Comments Fields WordPress plugin before 4.1 does not escape Field Error Message, which could allow high-privileged users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when unfiltered_html is disallowed
